Articles.Content:
How's everybody's day? Needs more zombies, you say?

So, while attending classes this semester a friend of mine informed me he was into making films. Pretty cool to begin with, but he later told me that he is trying to make a short film from a story he had published by the name 'Of Loss and Zombies'. Even cooler, right? Indie film development for the win!

Here's the link for anyone who wants to contribute: http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/of-loss-and-zombies/x/5468680

Thanks in advance for anyone who contributes!
